category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Revision_Name_Based_On_ItemRevision
preference.preference_description: Indicates if Revision names displayed in the "Revise" dialog should be based on Item Revision names or Item names. Valid Values: * true: Revision names are based on Item Revision names. This is the default value. * false: Revision names are based on Item names.
